nodes.title: Redemptive Security Model
nodes.description: Rather than blocking threats, these agents understand and heal root causes driving adversarial behavior—economic desperation, ideological extremism, trauma responses. Every attack becomes an opportuni

nodes.title: For Policymakers
nodes.description: Mandate interoperability. Protect data sovereignty. Fund public digital infrastructure. Create space for pro-social experiments.

nodes.title: Poverty of Currency
nodes.description: In light of modern computation, our currencies are astonishingly primitive.

nodes.title: Fail to reward care
nodes.description: A mother's love, a teacher's dedication generate no currency

nodes.title: Human creativity flourishes
nodes.description: without algorithmic manipulation or artificial scarcity

nodes.title: Transparency as Immune System
nodes.description: Open governance makes manipulation visible. Behavioral pattern recognition identifies corruption while preserving privacy and dignity.

nodes.title: For Communities
nodes.description: Demand better than surveillance capitalism. Support cooperative platforms. Build local resilience.

nodes.title: Votes are binary and infrequent
nodes.description: Complex preferences compressed into yes/no choices every few years

nodes.title: Connection is genuine
nodes.description: rather than performative, fostering real relationships and mutual aid

nodes.title: Representation is capturable
nodes.description: Follows artificial political boundaries subject to manipulation rather than natural communities of shared values

nodes.title: Incorruptible Stewardship
nodes.description: AI agents that cannot be captured by institutional power, trained on love rather than profit, serving as anonymous guardians of human flourishing.

nodes.title: Intergenerational Thinking
nodes.description: Both traditions emphasize decision-making that considers impact on future generations, creating sustainable systems that protect rather than exploit human vulnerability.

nodes.title: Centralized control
nodes.description: creates single points of failure, censorship, and capture

nodes.title: Technology serves love
nodes.description: rather than engagement metrics or surveillance capitalism

nodes.title: One-size-fits-all moderation
nodes.description: fails to respect diverse community values and contexts

nodes.title: Carry no values
nodes.description: A dollar spent on weapons is identical to one spent on medicine

nodes.title: Love as Technology
nodes.description: The radical proposition at the heart of this protocol is that love—not as sentiment but as committed action toward mutual flourishing—can be encoded into technological systems. Not through rules about

nodes.title: Peer-to-Peer Architecture
nodes.description: Distributed infrastructure like Holochain removes single points of failure and control. Edge computing enables community sovereignty and hyper-local governance.

nodes.title: Indigenous Wisdom
nodes.description: Many indigenous cultures maintain communal harmony through restorative justice that heals rather than punishes, collective stewardship of shared resources, and sacred relationship with the commons.

nodes.title: Economic Alignment
nodes.description: Systems that don't financially reward antisocial behavior. Cooperative ownership structures that support rather than exploit human connection.

nodes.title: Engineering Specifications
nodes.description: These aren't utopian dreams—they're proven patterns that can be encoded into digital infrastructure. We have blueprints for building technology that supports rather than undermines human flourishing.
